remedies.malware: Remedy: Run a full system antivirus scan, isolate the affected systems, and update your antivirus software.
remedies.file_tampering: Remedy: Restore the affected files from backup, change file permissions, and monitor file integrity.
remedies.unauthorized_access: Remedy: Reset passwords, implement multi-factor authentication, and review access logs.
remedies.security_breach: Remedy: Disconnect affected systems from the network, conduct a thorough investigation, and notify affected parties.
remedies.advanced_malware: Remedy: Employ advanced threat detection tools, perform a deep system scan, and update security protocols.
remedies.phishing: Remedy: Educate users about phishing, implement email filtering solutions, and report the phishing attempt.
remedies.data_leakage: Remedy: Identify the source of the leak, implement data loss prevention solutions, and review data access policies.
remedies.SQL_Injection: Remedies: Use parameterized queries to separate SQL code from user input, and validate and sanitize all user inputs.
remedies.Cross_Site_Scripting(XSS): Remedy:Validate and sanitize all user inputs,Implement a strict Content Security Policy (CSP).
